text:
Could you remove password from debug logs :
**_oauthlib/oauth2/rfc6749/grant_types/resource_owner_password_credentials.py_**
Line **_168, 169**_

``` python
        log.debug('Validating username %s and password %s.',
                  request.username, request.password)
```

Thanks in advance
title: Passwords disclosure in debug logs
